remark.en: MST program. Only students of the MST can take the course.Thursday /13:30~16:30，B105, IoC, AS
remark.ch: 限中研院國際研究生院MST學程學生修習。四/13:30~16:30，中研院化學所B105

goal.en: This course will introduce the basic concepts and models used to understand the structure and property of organic compounds. The application of these concepts to rationalize various types of organic reactions will be illustrated
goal.ch: This course will introduce the basic concepts and models used to understand the structure and property of organic compounds. The application of these concepts to rationalize various types of organic reactions will be illustrated

content.en:
1. Part 1: Fundamentals of Structure and Bonding
2. Part 2: Micro-Steps in Organometallic Chemistry
3. Part 3: Typical Transition-Metal-Catalyzed and -Mediated Reactions
4. Part 4: Writing Reaction Mechanism Involving Transition Metal Complexes
5. Part 5: Synthetic Applications of Transition Metal Hydrides
6. Part 6: Synthetic Applications of Transition Metal Carbonyl Complexes
7. Part 7: Synthetic Applications of Transition Metal Carbene Complexes
8. Part 8: Synthetic Applications of Transition Metal Alkene and Alkyne Complexes
9. Part 9: Synthetic Applications of Transition Allyl Metal Complexes
10. Part 10: Synthetic Applications of Transition Metal Arene Complexes
content.ch:
1. Part 1: Fundamentals of Structure and Bonding
2. Part 2: Micro-Steps in Organometallic Chemistry

6. Part 6: Synthetic Applications of Transition Metal Carbonyl Complexes
7. Part 7: Synthetic Applications of Transition Metal Carbene Complexes
8. Part 8: Synthetic Applications of Transition Metal Alkene and Alkyne Complexes
9. Part 9: Synthetic Applications of Transition Allyl Metal Complexes
10. Part 10: Synthetic Applications of Transition Metal Arene Complexes

en.competency: Advanced knowledge in the research subfield

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現
